name: A Troubled Double
description:
You are wanted!!! But your brother isn't... Use him to escape!!! In 'A Troubled Double' you play as a juvenile delinquent on the run, wanted by the authorities! What they don't know is that you have a twin brother, and he can help you escape!!  Throw your brother around to get him to take out scanner drones and push buttons, moving walls and forming platforms to help you escape! This game was made in 3 weeks for Game Endeavor's 5th Community Jam. Controls/Rules:
  • WASD, Arrow Keys to move
  • W, Up, or Space to jump
  • Hold E to charge shot, release to throw
  • Destroy all bots to unlock the door
  • You must leave with your brother
  • Escape Pursuit!!
Credits: The Team:
  • Gameplay: Barwani
  • Game/Level Design: Barwani+ PurplDude
  • Animation: Timmy
  • Music: Barwani+ megalo
  • SFX: Barwani
Made Using:
  • The Godot Engine
  • Paint.NET
  • FL Studio
  • Audacity
  • Ibis Paint X
  • Pencil and Paper!!!!
